advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
With Fan TV on iOS, you’ll always know where to find and watch the Movies and TV shows you love. Get inspired with recommendations from friends & critics. Stay in the loop with in-theater info, reviews, and the latest entertainment news. Find where and how to watch across apps. Discovering and enjoying entertainment is easy on Fan TV.

Fan TV delivers everything that makes you a fan, so you can stop searching and start watching what you love most. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Over 34 Services In One Place

Netflix, Hulu, HBO, Amazon, iTunes, Fandango, Crackle, YouTube, NBC, The CW, ABC, ABC Family, PBS, Lifetime, truTV, Cinemax, CBS, Comedy Central, Syfy, Nickelodeon, USA, MTV, Fox, Adult Swim, Cartoon Network, Vudu, among others. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fan TV Features

WATCHLIST – Most of us have scattered lists of movies we want to see, often trying to remember which and where we wrote them down.  Welcome to Fan TV’s global WatchList, which puts your ‘must-sees’ front and center on all your devices.   You’ll even get notifications when content on your WatchList is available to you on your services. 

FOLLOW WHAT’S TRENDING – Always know what’s on the tip of everyone’s tongue.  We’ll keep you posted on recommendations from friends & insiders to get you inspired.  Look to the experts and your trusted network to help select the best in entertainment. 

REVIEWS, TRAILERS, CAST & CREW – Discover movies and TV with all the information you need to bring quality programming to your screen.  Fan TV puts the power at your fingertips with trailers, cast and crew information, as well as Rotten Tomatoes reviews from the best.

Happy Watching!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fan TV in the News

“50 Must-have iPad apps” – Time Magazine

"Fanhattan is probably the best movie/TV discovery app on the market right now." – TechCrunch
“A slick Launchpad… find and watch what you want.”  - Time Magazine

"Enter Fanhattan, a beautiful, versatile new app that aims to be a navigator on this sea of movie and TV services...I consider Fanhattan a smart product, and can recommend it." – Wall Street Journal

"Fanhattan points you exactly where you need to go and more...the interface is movie star gorgeous." - Gizmodo
trackCensoredName: Fan TV - Discover Movies and TV for Netflix, Hulu, Amazon and more!
